snippet: For the first time since 2006, young Gazans under age 8 were allowed on Monday to visit their parents in Israeli prisons.
abstract: Israel eases up policy on visits to Gaza prisoners for first time since 2006, allowing Gazan children under age 8  to visit their parents in Israeli jails.
lead_paragraph: For the first time since 2006, young Gazans under age 8 were allowed on Monday to visit their parents in Israeli prisons.

headline.seo: Israel Allows Gazan Children to Visit Imprisoned Parents
headline.main: Israel Allows Gazan Children to Visit Imprisoned Parents
headline.print_headline: Israel Allows Gazan Children To Visit Imprisoned Parents
